= Syntax =
A VALIDATION should be<br>
FIELDVALIDATION`[`, FIELDVALIDATION...`]`

A FIELDVALIDATION should be<br>
{_name_|_index_}:_DATATYPE_`[`(_SUBVALIDATION_)`]`<br>
`[`REQUIRED`]`<br>
`[`ON {ERROR|MISSING} {REJECT|BREAK|SET _value_}`]`<br>

Available _DATATYPE_ is
  * string
    * email
    * url
    * date
  * number
    * integer
      * dec
      * hex
      * oct
      * bin
    * float
  * boolean
  * array
  * index
Available _SUBVALIDATION_ is<br>
*string* a reg-ex pattern<br>
example: `string('/^\d{2}\w+$/')`<br>
*date*   date format<br>
example: date('Y-m-d')<br>
*number* and all numeric types allow comma separated comparison expression<br>
example1: integer(>18, <90, !=35)<br>
example2: float(>3.1, <6.6)<br>
example3: integer(in (3,6,9, 12,15,18))<br>
*array* and *index* use VALIDATION query as its _SUBVALIDATION_<br>
example: `array( subkey:string('/\s+/') on error set '',subkey2:integer(<18, >=0) required )`
